page.title: 09Leisure and Recreation
page.content: The most popular leisure activity in Tonbridge is watching television. However, Tonbridge has many sports facilities.The main sports centres are the Sports Ground and The Angel Centre which is an indoor complex.The Angel Centre caters for Gymnastics, badminton, squash, basketball, dancing and rollerskating etc. There are things to suit all ages and tastes. It also has exhibitions, craft fairs, and occasionally films.The Sports Ground has facilities for tennis,football, rugby,cricket,bowls and an 18 hole putting green.Although we already have an outdoor swimming they are thinking of building an indoor one,but nothing has happened yet. There are no cinemas in Tonbridge now but there used to be two.One is now a Bingo Hall the other a store. CONTINUED ON PAGE 10.
